input.sentences: the outside of the abondonded building we explored
we made the throne of trash
who knows what all these keys went to
that is a very true statement
empty spaces like this feel very weird
output.sentences: Being a janitor can be a very rewarding and very difficult time.
Sitting upon your throne, you are the king of your domain.
All doors can be opened with the right key.
You must be careful when cleaning not to mix solvents and solutions, you only have one pair of eyes, one nose and two hands.
Even in an empty room, being a janitor is always a fulfilling job, you must love what you do.
